action.action-desc: Mr. Bera (for himself, Ms. Kuster of New Hampshire, Mr. Schneider, Mr. Delaney, and Mr. Peters) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to align open enrollment periods for Exchange plans with the deadline for filing Federal income tax returns, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Easy Enrollment Act of 2018.

section.header: Aligning open enrollment periods for Exchange plans with deadline for filing Federal income tax returns

subsection.text: Subparagraph (B) of section 1311(c)(6) of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (42 U.S.C. 18031(c)(6)) is amended to read as follows:

clause.text: for calendar years after the initial enrollment period and before 2020, as determined by the Secretary; and
for 2020 and subsequent calendar years, that begin on a date specified by the Secretary and end on April 15 of such calendar year;

subsection.text: Not later than 180 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, the Secretary of Health and Human Services shall issue regulations to carry out the amendment made by subsection (a).
